column3: bosoom no ne da a otsia eduonu biako no
column4: EWURADZE n’asɛm nam nkɔnhyɛnyi Hagai do baa dɛ
column13: "Woana aka wɔ hom mu a ohun dan yi wɔ n’enyimnyam a odzi kan no mu? Na hom hu no dɛn sesei? Aso ɔnnka hwee nnkyerɛ hom?"

column5: EWURADZE na ɔse; na ɔsɔfopanyin Josua
column7: hyɛ dzen; na hom asaase do nkorɔfo nyina
column10: EWURADZE na ɔse: na mowɔ hom nkyɛn
column13: "ɔnam ahyɛmu a menye hom dzii wɔ
column14: ber a hom fii Egypt bae no
column15: na mo sunsum a ɔtse hom mu no ntsi: mma hom nnsuro."

column2: "Na mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE ka nye yi: Bio

column3: na amanaman nyina akoradze bɛba mo hɔ na medze enyimnyam bɛhyɛ fie yi ma

column2: "Enyimnyam a fie yi benya no ekyir yi no bɔso asen nkan no dze no
column3: dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse: na fie yi mu na mebɛma asomdwee

column2: "Bosoom a otsia akron no mu da a otsia eduonu anan wɔ Darius n’afe a otsia ebien no mu no
column3: na EWURADZE n’asɛm nam nkɔnhyɛnyi Hagai do bae
column6: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: afei bisa asɔfo no wɔ mbra no ho
column9: "Ana sɛ obi dze nam krɔnkrɔn hyɛ n’atar mu
column10: na sɛ ɔdze n’atar no kɛka paanoo
column15: aso ɔbɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn? Na asɔfo no buae see dɛ

column3: Sɛ obi a fun ama no ho ekum kɛka iyinom a
column4: no ho kum? Na asɔfo no buae see dɛ

column3: Mbrɛ nkorɔfo yi tse nye no
column4: na mbrɛ ɔman yi tse wɔ m’enyim nye no
column5: mbrɛ hɔn nsaano edwuma nyina tse nye no; na dza wɔdze bɔ afɔr wɔ hɔ no no ho ekum

column4: hom nhwɛ dza ofi ndɛ rokɔ yi ɔbɛba; ber wonnyae mmfaa ɔbo nntoo ɔbo do wɔ EWURADZE asɔrfi mu no owiee hom dɛn?"

column3: sɛ obi baa esusudze ekuw eduonu ho a
column4: nna du pɛ na onyae; sɛ obi baa nsatwer ho rebɛsaw etwadze eduonum a

column2: "Medze ohuw na ɔpo na ɔsorbo mobɔɔ hom wɔ hom nsaano edwuma nyina mu; naaso hom annsan ammba me nkyɛn

column4: hom ndwendwen mber a abɛsen kɔ no ho. Aso nna aba bi da ho wɔ ɔsan do? Mekyerɛ wenyindua
column7: na ngodua aba. Afei hom nhwɛ ofi ndɛ rokɔ
column8: hom mfa ntoto ofi bosoom a otsia akron no ne da a otsia eduonu anan a wɔtoow EWURADZE asɔrdan no ne fapem wɔ mu no ho. Hom hu no dɛn? Ofitsi dɛm da yi do no na mebɛhyɛ ase ehyira hom."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Hagai hɔ ne mpɛn ebien wɔ bosoom no ne da a otsia eduonu anan no mu

column3: na masɛɛ amanaman ahendzi n’ahoɔdzen; na mubobutuw ntseaseanam
column4: na hɔn a wɔtsetse mu no; na mpɔnkɔ na hɔn do atsefo bɔhwehwe ase
column5: obiara bɔtɔ no nua afona anomu."

column9: na mayɛ wo dɛ nsɔwanodze: na ɔwo na masan mu meyi wo
